plugins.name: Color Tokens
plugins.description:
Instructions:


  1. Copy the ColorToken component
  2. Apply your a color variable to the mainColor layer
  3. Run the plugin on a page with ColorToken instances


The variable name, HEX, RGBA, and aliases will be automatically populate for all ColorToken variants on the page. Additionally, you can turn on the contrast variable and apply any color, rerun the plugin and it will populate the contrast-ratio rating.


*Note: You can change component name but please do not rename layers.
plugins.tagline: Document all your color variables in one place, exactly how you want them

plugins.name: CopyCAT
plugins.description:
CopyCAT is a Figma plugin for effortlessly creating multiple variations of a design using a CSV file for data. This plugin is ideal for producing sets of similar designs with different content, such as business cards, social media posts, or product labels, or anything you want to really.


How to use:

  1. Design a template in Figma.
  2. Open the CopyCAT plugin and select the layer.
  3. Choose all the text layers you want to edit later
  4. Download the template CSV
  5. Add your data to the CSV and reupload it.
  6. Generate copies!


Watch this demo to get a better idea: https://www.loom.com/share/c99e3691aa734a35bffa5591890e410c?sid=508074d9-0c5b-4c76-aca6-d865ea25f176
plugins.tagline: A plugin to batch edit your design templates.

plugins.name: blokdots
plugins.description:
blokdots is a simple to use software to build interactive hardware prototypes without a line of code.


With this plugin you can connect Figma to the blokdots app (--> download at blokdots.com), making it possible to use hardware components like sensors and buttons to control and manipulate elements right in Figma. This means it is now possible to bridge the gap between hardware and UI prototypes!


— What you can do

You can use hardware components to set the text, color, size, rotation or position of Figma layers and map the values of your sensors to the color, size, rotation or position of a layer.


— How to use the Plugin

In the blokdots app, go to “Connect A New Component” and select “Figma” to add the integration to your project.


Then run the blokdots Plugin in Figma. Select the layer you want to be able to manipulate with your hardware prototype and press the “Expose to blokdots” button in the Plugin window.


You can now select “Figma” as a component in any card in blokdots, select one of the layers you exposed and define how it should respond.


When you run your project in blokdots, make sure the blokdots plugin in Figma is running as well. blokdots and Figma will connect automatically and you can now manipulate Figma layers right from your hardware prototype!


— Requirements

To use this plugin you need to …

• have the latest version of the blokdots app installed and running --> download at blokdots.com

• have an Arduino microcontroller set up

• use the Figma Desktop version

plugins.name: Tally
plugins.description:
Quickly tally stamp votes for stickys!


Select everything you want to tally up (including the stickys and stamps) and run the plugin. It will add a visual tally count to the bottom right of every sticky for everyone to see.


Notes:

  • Don't worry if the selection contains other types of components, they won't affect the tally. Just drag a big rectangle selection over the entire area and let Tally handle the rest!
  • You will need to re-select and run the plugin every time new stamps are added that you want to include in the count
  • Stamps do not need to be directly on a sticky for them to be counted. If a stamp is part of the selection, it will count towards the sticky that it's closest to

plugins.name: Layer Namer
plugins.description:
Do you find layer-naming a chore? Are you tired of being called out for "sloppy" design files? This plugin gives your layers nice, human names. It renames all the layers in your selection and all their children (and descendants)


Settings

  1. Optionally choose a gender for first names
  2. Toggle last names on or off


(Current) Limitations

  1. The plugin will rename all the layers in your selection
  2. The plugin will rename layers it has already named


Contents

  1. The 100 most common surnames in the United States, according to the 2000 United States census
  2. The 100 most common male and female names in the US over the last 100 years (1922–2021)

accepted.name: Norton
accepted.description:
Electronic means, humanist ends.
Open to new UI/UX projects 🌱

plugins.tagline: Every layer deserves a nice name. Like "Nancy" or "Charles"

plugins.name: Acrolinx for Figma and FigJam
plugins.description:
Acrolinx is an AI-powered platform that eliminates content chaos and delivers strategy-aligned content, at scale.


Our technology captures the way your enterprise communicates, aligns your content with your guidelines, shortens your editorial process with automation, and analyzes the performance of your entire content operation.


Get customers faster, keep them longer, and reduce risks in communication.


As you write, the Acrolinx Sidebar guides you to create content that’s aligned with your strategy. Acrolinx ensures you’re using the words and phrases that are relevant to your company tone of voice and the audience you’re trying to reach. See where your content is strong and where it could be stronger with a detailed Acrolinx Scorecard and Analytics insights.


Acrolinx is not a stand-alone authoring tool. It’s an enterprise tool, which requires a paid existing Acrolinx account. If your company doesn’t have Acrolinx installed (or you’re not sure) we’d love to help you learn more.


Visit www.acrolinx.com to discover how you can supercharge your content.
plugins.tagline: This plugin adds the Acrolinx Sidebar to Figma and FigJam!

Determining the colours can be the most challenging thing to start a project, especially a project that begins only based on the logo provided by the client.

plugins.name: Pinpasta – Create moodboards from your pins.
plugins.description:
Do you love collecting inspiration on Pinterest and designing in Figma? PinPasta bridges the gap effortlessly!


🌟 Features:

  1. Quick Copying: Copy all pins from any Pinterest board to your clipboard with a single click.
  2. Effortless Pasting: Paste all copied images directly into your Figma or FigJam boards.
  3. Moodboard Magic: Perfect for creating stunning moodboards and inspiration boards in Figma.


How to Use:

  1. Install the PinPasta Chrome Extension: Get it here.
  2. Install the PinPasta Figma Plugin: Get it here.
  3. Start Creating: Copy your Pinterest pins and paste them into Figma effortlessly.


Limitations:

  1. Free Version: Paste up to 30 images in one go.
  2. Full Version: Buy a license key to remove the limit and paste unlimited images.


Why You'll Love PinPasta:

  1. Save Time: No more downloading and uploading images.
  2. Boost Creativity: Quickly gather all your visual inspiration in one place.
  3. Stay Organized: Keep your design workflow smooth and efficient.


Visit pinpasta.hehe.studio for more details and to get started!
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly copy and paste Pins to Figma with PinPasta. Seamless moodboard creation made easy.

plugins.name: Oscill
plugins.description:
Transform any vector path in your Figma document into a wave with frequency, amplitude, fade in/out and more defined by you. Choose from a set of different waveforms: Sine, Triangle and Square.


1) Draw or select a vector path. (works with other shapes too).


2) Click on ‘Sync’ button.


3) Play.


4) Click ‘Sync’ again every time you select or modify a path.


-> Your generated wave will adapt to the new selected path.


5) Click on the ‘Place’ button.


-> Your shape will get the same styling as the selected object and will be placed over it.


---------------------------------------------------------------

Would you like to support the development of new features and plugins?


You can buy me a coffee.



Thank you!

accepted.name: Eduardo Barbosa

How to use

  1. Install the plugin from Figma Community
  2. Select an object on your Figma design or FigJam canvas that is the desired size
  3. Open Quick Actions (Cmd ⌘ + K on Mac; Ctrl + K on Windows) and select Match Size > 1. Set
  4. Select the other object(s) that you want to match to the desired size
  5. Open Quick Actions and select Match Size > 2. Apply
plugins.tagline: Bring harmony to your diagrams and layouts

plugins.name: Tokens to Tailwind CSS
plugins.description:
This plugin generates utility classes for Tailwind CSS from design tokens set in the local style of Figma.


Instructions

  1. Create a local styles.
  2. Run this plugin.
  3. Select some options and press generate button.
  4. Copy and paste the generated code into the Tailwind CSS configuration file.


*Currently only colour styles are supported.


Options

・Primitive colours

Generates the primitive styles referenced by the semantic style as CSS variables.


・Classify by keys

Classify by key if a special name is used for the first level of the style name.


Find out more:

https://github.com/K-shigehito/figma-tokens-to-tailwind#readme

plugins.name: Designtips.today
plugins.description:
First Chinese Figma workshop plugin that teach you how to use Figma inside Figma!

visit: https://designtips.today/


首創在 Figma 裡面學習 Figma 的中文教學套件

不需要離開 Figma，就能開啟學習的大門 🖼designtips.today 裡會將中文化的第一手學習資源都端上來給你。系統化的文字搭配清楚的圖片敘述，讓學習 Figma 再也不徬徨!


這座圖書館，任你自由探索

Figma 熱鍵技巧、設計系統建立、Prototyping 練習...我們將會陸續上架不同面向的課程，讓你想學什麼，就學什麼✌️


From zero to hero，精熟工具、套件、到實作概念

一步步從基礎開始建立觀念，慢慢介紹套件與流程上的眉角，最終讓你茁壯到能輕鬆解決各種需求! 🚀


What is designtips.today?

這個知識庫不僅僅是個套件，更是培養你建立思考問題的習慣與面對需求時的解決方法，希望在它的幫助下，你可以成為更獨當一面的讚讚設計師 🦄

plugins.name: Print Resizer
plugins.description:
This plugin collects all components from frames in the current figma page and then copies and rearranges them into new printable frames. The printable frames can then be exported and printed on regular letter head. This plugin is especially helpful for frames with auto-layout since they can only scale in only one direction, making printing difficult.


Visit github for more information on how to use the plugin, how to report issues, and how to suggest further improvements.

plugins.name: Bloq: Create, edit, and renew new/existing design systems
plugins.description:
🎨 What is Bloq?


Bloq is a Figma plugin that revolutionizes how design systems are created and maintained.


It offers three major capabilities:

1. Generate an Entire Design System from Scratch

• Get customized color palettes, typography, border radii, spacing, margins, and a fully variablized component kit ready to use.

• Perfectly Integrates with the figma ecosystem and industry standard nomenclature.


2. Fix Existing Files or Frames

• Automatically detect and assign brand guideline values to every component in your file.

• Choose to fix specific modules, such as a selected screen or an entire page, according to your needs.


3. Create and Enhance Components

• Scan entire pages to detect all major components, resulting in a new component kit made from the screens on the page.

• Get all possible variants and states of components generated, with properties automatically assigned to their respective elements.



😫 The Problem


Creating and maintaining design systems is painful:

• Manually creating variables for colors, typography, and spacing takes hours.

• Ensuring consistency across existing designs is tedious and error-prone.

• Updating old files to match new brand guidelines is a nightmare.

• Building component libraries and design kit from scratch requires weeks of work.



✨ The Solution


Bloq automates the entire process:

1. Input: Pick a figma file and run Bloq on it.

2. Analyze: Our AI examines your design patterns.

3. Generate: Get a complete, variablized component kit in minutes.

4. Update: Modify existing designs with one click.

5. Enhance: Generate complete component sets with variants automatically detected.



🔥 Key Features


• 🎨 Smart Color Palette Detection: Supports neutral and accent colors.

• 📝 Intelligent Typography System: Automatic style clustering.

• 📏 Automated Spacing & Border Radius Detection

• 🔄 Bulk Update Capability for Existing Designs

• ⚡ Comprehensive Component Kits: Includes variants and component sets.

• 🎯 Flexible Fix Options: Fix a single frame or an entire page.



💪 Perfect For


• Design Teams: Launching new brands effortlessly.

• Agencies: Managing multiple client design systems with ease.

• Companies: Modernizing design infrastructure without hassle.

• Time-Savers: Anyone looking to save hours on design system creation.

• Efficient Creators: Building component libraries and kits without grunt work.



Ready to revolutionize your design workflow? Try Bloq today and experience the future of design system creation!
plugins.tagline: Create or fix the design systems in your files.

plugins.name: Define
plugins.description:
Define takes a single layer/group/frame/component/instance, finds out what it contains and gives you the specs for all supported objects it finds. While Define works on complex objects with many nested layers, it works best if you use it to Define individual components.


Currently it reports the following specs:

  • Text layers: font family, size, line height, color and opacity
  • Shapes: corner radius, fill color, stroke color, stroke width, stroke alignment and opacity
  • Effects: drop shadow

plugins.name: Product Market Font | PMF by Morisawa Fonts
plugins.description:
PMF by Morisawa Fonts【期間限定フォント搭載中】の主な機能


高品質なモリサワフォントの利用

  1. モリサワのフォントサービスからフォントを取得し、パス化を行うことで、デザインに反映させることができます
  2. UD新ゴ・リュウミン・ゴシックMB101などデザイナーに愛されるプロフェッショナルな定番書体やデザイン書体を利用可能です


文字属性の設定

  1. フォント選択だけでなく、字間、プロポーショナルなど、簡易なタイポグラフィ設定を調整できます
  2. 縦書き機能（β版）も搭載しており、リールなど縦型動画に向けたタイポグラフィを支援します


テキストのパス化・復元によるコラボレーション

  1. テキストをSVG形式でパス化する機能を搭載。Figma上でパス化したテキストを元の状態に復元することが可能で、柔軟なデザイン変更や共有に対応し、コラボレーションを加速します
  2. エクスポートした素材は、他のデザインツールやプラットフォームでも利用が可能です


Product Market Font (PMF) by Morisawa Fontsとは

  1. あらゆるデザイナーとコラボレーターのシームレスな連携のための無料のFigmaプラグインです。Figma上でモリサワの高品質なフォントをパス化・復元し、コラボレーションにおけるデザインプロセスを効率化します
  2. 有償のフォントライセンスを保有していなくても利用可能なので、ノンデザイナーとの連携の際にもお役立ていただければ幸いです
  3. プラグインの♡獲得に応じて人気書体を追加搭載いたしております。コメントやヒアリングを参考に引き続きアップデートして参ります。ご協力の程、よろしくお願いいたします


PMF by Morisawa Fonts利用例

  1. コミュニケーションデザイン制作: SVG形式で簡単にエクスポートできるので、簡易的なデザインなどに利用可能。スマホ縦型表示に向けた縦書き利用へも対応しており、Figma上での新たなデザインの挑戦を支援します。
  2. サービスデザインに向けたフォント選定: フォントの見本としてのプレビュー機能も有しているので、デザインシステム制定前のサービスやプロダクトのイメージ作成を支援。最適なブランド構築を実施する為のクリエイティブの幅を広げます。 ※デザインシステム制定後のデザインへの利用は推奨しておりません
  3. Webデザイン: タグラインやキーメッセージなどをモリサワのフォントに置き換えるなど活用し、より具体的なモックアップ上でのイメージ再現・訴求への利用。


よくある質問

Q1. モリサワのフォントサービスを契約していない場合でも使用できますか？

A1. 基本的な機能をご契約なしで利用可能です。今後は、フル版の機能を活用するにはモリサワのMorisawa Fontsサービスの契約が必要になる可能性がございます。


Q2. SVG形式のエクスポートには制限がありますか？

A2. 制限はありませんが、使用や制限等は今後の利用状況に応じて変わる可能性がございます。


Q3. 書体ラインナップの変更や追加はありますか？

A3. ございます。フィードバックやコメントを参考に書体ラインナップの変更を検討しています。プラグインの稼働数、♡獲得数に応じてイチ押しの書体追加や機能アップデートもさせていただいております。

現在、大人気の期間限定書体を月替わりで搭載中です。是非ご活用いただけましたら幸いです。


Q4. 商標登録をすることはできますか？

A4. 本プラグインで作成したデザインを商標登録することはできません。商標登録をご希望される場合には、正規のMorisawa Fontsライセンスを取得していただくことでご登録が可能です。


Q5. 商業利用は可能ですか？

A5. はい、本プラグインで作成したデザインは商業利用可能です。但し、プラグインで生成したデータ自体を、再配布・販売する行為及びAIや機械学習の学習データとして使用することは禁止させていただきます。本プラグインは、ユーザーの皆様が、より自由に、より創造的にコラボレーション及びデザインできる環境を提供することを目的としています。ご理解の程、よろしくお願いいたします。


※β版のため、今後予告なく仕様変更となる可能性があります。あらかじめご了承ください。


Main features of PMF by Morisawa Fonts


Use of high-quality fonts

  1. Fonts can be obtained from Morisawa's font service and converted to paths, allowing them to be reflected in designs.
  2. Professional standard typefaces and design typefaces loved by designers, such as UD Shin Go, Ryumin, and Gothic MB101, can be used.


Character attribute settings

  1. In addition to font selection, you can also adjust simple typography settings such as character spacing and proportionality
  2. It also has a vertical writing function (beta version), which supports typography for vertical videos such as reels.


Collaboration through text path creation and restoration

  1. The software is equipped with a function that converts text into paths in SVG format. It is possible to restore the text that has been converted into paths in Figma to its original state, which supports flexible design changes and sharing, and accelerates collaboration.
  2. The exported materials can also be used in other design tools and platforms.


Morisawa Fontsについて

Morisawa Fontsはクラウド型のフォントサブスクリプションサービスです。グラフィックデザイン、WebサイトやプロダクトのUI/UX、映像や動画といったモーショングラフィックスなど、さまざまなクリエイティブスタイルに必要なフォント環境を柔軟に提供します。また、事業規模に応じたエンタープライズ要件に対応する機能も随時アップデートし、効率的なワークフローをサポートします。

Morisawa Fonts|高品質でバラエティ豊かな3000書体以上のフォントを提供

A1. 基本的な機能をご契約なしで利用可能です。今後は、フル版の機能を活用するにはモリサワのMorisawa Fontsサービスの契約が必要になる可能性がございます。


Q2. SVG形式のエクスポートには制限がありますか？

A2. 制限はありませんが、使用や制限等は今後の利用状況に応じて変わる可能性がございます。


Q3. 書体ラインナップの変更や追加はありますか？

A3. ございます。フィードバックやコメントを参考に書体ラインナップの変更を検討しています。プラグインの稼働数、♡獲得数に応じてイチ押しの書体追加や機能アップデートもさせていただいております。

現在、大人気の期間限定書体を月替わりで搭載中です。是非ご活用いただけましたら幸いです。


Q4. 商標登録をすることはできますか？

A4. 本プラグインで作成したデザインを商標登録することはできません。商標登録をご希望される場合には、正規のMorisawa Fontsライセンスを取得していただくことでご登録が可能です。


Q5. 商業利用は可能ですか？

A5. はい、本プラグインで作成したデザインは商業利用可能です。但し、プラグインで生成したデータ自体を、再配布・販売する行為及びAIや機械学習の学習データとして使用することは禁止させていただきます。本プラグインは、ユーザーの皆様が、より自由に、より創造的にコラボレーション及びデザインできる環境を提供することを目的としています。ご理解の程、よろしくお願いいたします。


※β版のため、今後予告なく仕様変更となる可能性があります。あらかじめご了承ください。


Main features of PMF by Morisawa Fonts


Use of high-quality fonts

  1. Fonts can be obtained from Morisawa's font service and converted to paths, allowing them to be reflected in designs.
  2. Professional standard typefaces and design typefaces loved by designers, such as UD Shin Go, Ryumin, and Gothic MB101, can be used.


Character attribute settings

  1. In addition to font selection, you can also adjust simple typography settings such as character spacing and proportionality
  2. It also has a vertical writing function (beta version), which supports typography for vertical videos such as reels.


Collaboration through text path creation and restoration

  1. The software is equipped with a function that converts text into paths in SVG format. It is possible to restore the text that has been converted into paths in Figma to its original state, which supports flexible design changes and sharing, and accelerates collaboration.
  2. The exported materials can also be used in other design tools and platforms.


Morisawa Fontsについて

Morisawa Fontsはクラウド型のフォントサブスクリプションサービスです。グラフィックデザイン、WebサイトやプロダクトのUI/UX、映像や動画といったモーショングラフィックスなど、さまざまなクリエイティブスタイルに必要なフォント環境を柔軟に提供します。また、事業規模に応じたエンタープライズ要件に対応する機能も随時アップデートし、効率的なワークフローをサポートします。

Morisawa Fonts|高品質でバラエティ豊かな3000書体以上のフォントを提供

plugins.name: VRT
plugins.description:
Easily track changes across your entire Figma file and avoid accidentally breaking something.


Step 1: Snapshot your current file

The first thing you'll want to do is set your baseline. This will go through all of your pages and create snapshot images for each of them. If your file has many pages, you can select or deselect individual pages.


Step 2: Go make some changes

Once you've got your baseline snapshots set, go forth and make some changes. For example, you may be curious what will happen if you change a specific color. When you're finished, click 'Take Snapshot'


Step 3: Compare Results

At a glance, pages that have any visually noticeable changes will be shown as failed. The baseline snapshot is compared against the comparision snapshot to produce a diff image. Any changes will be marked red.


------------------------------------


Completely open source.

plugins.name: Localize
plugins.description:
Localize Your Figma Designs in Minutes


Let your designs speak for themselves. Effortlessly translate your Figma creations into other languages.


Showcase your designs in front of the largest audience possible. Localize seamlessly integrates with Figma allowing you to amplify your work’s impact by making it accessible to more people and languages.


Unlike run-of-the-mill translators, Localize offers designers an easy and elegant solution that:


  1. Takes the hassle out of internationalization (i18n) and localization (l10n) processes
  2. Automates and streamlines localization workflows right in the design phase
  3. Reduces content translation complexities by eliminating the need for development resources
  4. Maximizes ROI by speeding up time to market


Localize empowers you to create globally-inclusive UI and UX designs, expanding the appeal and reach of your work by presenting them in the languages of your target markets.


Localization as easy as 1, 2, 3


  1. Install Plugin. Go to the Community section on Figma’s website. Select Plugins and use the search functionality to locate Localize. Select Install on the top-right corner of the Localize plugin page.
  2. Connecting to Localize. Once installed, access Localize via the Plugins dropdown.
  3. Enter your API Key. Start a Localize free trial or integrate with your Localize Business plan (or higher) by entering the API key.


I already have a Localize Advanced plan or higher account:


  1. Install the Localize plugin in Figma.
  2. Open your Figma file.
  3. Hover over Plugins in the toolbar. Select Localize.
  4. Type in your Localize API key. Select Connect.


I don’t have a Localize account yet:


  1. Install the Localize plugin in Figma.
  2. Open your Figma file.
  3. Hover over Plugins in the toolbar. Select Localize.
  4. Click the Start Your Free Trial link on the bottom of the login view.
  5. Create a Localize account and follow the Localize install steps.
  6. Return to Figma and type in your Localize API key. Then, select Connect.


If your organization doesn't have an Advanced plan, please click to upgrade your plan!


Need help?


For more information and to learn how to install the plugin, visit our Help Docs


Don’t have a Localize account? Try it for free!
plugins.tagline: Localize Your Figma Designs in Minutes

plugins.name: Diagrammaton
plugins.description:
Diagrammaton converts natural language descriptions into fleshed out diagrams.


Rapidly and incrementally sculpt your unstructured ideas into logical, coherent foundations upon which great ideas can take root.


Getting started


Diagrammaton currently requires an OpenAI API key and a free license code from diagrammaton.com


  1. Sign up for an OpenAI account and generate a key — here’s a guide
  2. Create a Diagrammaton account and generate a license code (requires Google sign-in)
  3. Run the plugin and paste your license code
  4. Create your first diagram!


Most diagrams have a common starting point. Here are some examples to get you started:

  • "An auth flow for a native mobile app that has OTP code verification, 2 factor, and optional biometric auth"
  • "A sign-up process that includes email verification, and profile setup"
  • "A typical mobile app sign in flow"
  • "A change management process for a design team working on a design system in Figma"



👉 Read the Diagrammaton guide to learn more about the plugin and upcoming features

plugins.name: Color wheel
plugins.description:
A color wheel is a circular representation of colors, typically made up of 12 hues. It's a fundamental tool in many fields like art, design, and printing, as it helps us understand how colors relate to each other.


RYB (Red, Yellow, Blue): This is the traditional painters' color wheel used for mixing physical paints.


RGB (Red, Green, Blue): This is the color model used for displays like TVs and computer screens.


CMYK (Cyan, Magenta, Yellow, Black): This is the color model used for printing.

plugins.name: Maximum Override
plugins.description:
Compare objects to see what's different, then copy and paste the changes. Compare instances to their default main component and copy and paste the overrides.


Features

1. Copy and paste overrides between symbols


Two of Figma's greatest strengths are:


a. Overriding colors, text, and other properties on component instances, and

b. Swapping out instances of components, such as a icons or states.


But when you swap an instance, you lose all the overrides you've made, including changes to nested instances within a parent component.


Maximum Override allows you to copy your overrides, swap out an instance, and then paste the overrides back onto the new instance, to retain all of your changes. This includes nested instances that you've swapped with a different component.


2. Compare properties between objects


Maximum Override also allows you to select any two nodes on the stage and compare them against each other to see what's different. (In software, this is known as a "diff".) You can then copy the changes from object A to object B, or vice-versa. If you select a single instance, Maximum Override will compare it against its own main component.


------------


Bugs? Suggestions? Contributions? See the open-source project at https://github.com/CrookedGrin/maximum-override.

plugins.name: Text Visual Alignment
plugins.description:
When working with typography in Figma you often have to manually move text layers and align them to the grid or ruler. This happens because of glyph sidebearings which create huge “white holes”. It gets even worse if you have two text layers of different sizes. In this case the “holes” become much more visible.


Our plugin compensates for the sidebearings and works with layers in two ways. Strict Alignment moves the text layer to the first visible pixel. It can be useful when you work with a group of single-line text layers. Optically Correct Alignment moves the layer to the sidebearing value of a straight glyph stem (Latin n/u, Cyrillic н). You can use this option for multi-line layers, especially when the text is set in small sizes.
plugins.tagline: Quickly compensate for sidebearings in text layers to align them perfectly

50603.description:

It gets even worse if you have two text layers of different sizes. In this case the “holes” become much more visible.


Our plugin compensates for the sidebearings and works with layers in two ways. Strict Alignment moves the text layer to the first visible pixel. It can be useful when you work with a group of single-line text layers. Optically Correct Alignment moves the layer to the sidebearing value of a straight glyph stem (Latin n/u, Cyrillic н). You can use this option for multi-line layers, especially when the text is set in small sizes.
50603.release_notes:
2.0. We revised and fixed the plugin’s work logic for cases when it processes several layers with multiple content types.
Also, now you can choose between upper- and lowercase layer alignment.
50603.tagline: Quickly compensate for sidebearings in text layers to align them perfectly

plugins.name: Restaurant Generator
plugins.description:
Restaurant generator allows you to populate your components with realistic, matching restaurant data. Simply name each of the layers by their supported data types and instant generate content for any component, frame, group, or layer. Supports multi-select and a hard coded set of restaurant data, but more to come!


For this to properly work, you need to name the field inside a component or group with the following options:

[data-name], [data-cuisine], [data-address], [data-cover]

plugins.name: Whitelabel Colour Generator
plugins.description:
This plugin will help you generate 3 supporting colours based off of a whitelabels primary value, as well as a UI primary value that meets AAA accessibility contrast.


The colours that will be generated are:

  • Dark Primary
  • Light Primary
  • Off-White Primary
  • UI Primary


Recommended Pairings

  • Dark + Light
  • UI + Off-White
